intro: Cardiaca marrubiastrum, commonly known as the heartleaf marrubiastrum, is a flowering plant belonging to the familyApiaceae. It is characterized by its distinctive heart-shaped leaves and small, clustered white flowers. Native to certain regions of southern Europe, it thrives in well-drained soils and full sun. The plant is often found in rocky or grassy habitats. Its botanical features make it a notable species for both ecological and horticultural study.
